personal.name: Alex Johnson
personal.title: Full Stack Developer & UI/UX Designer
personal.bio: Passionate full-stack developer with 5+ years of experience building scalable web applications and beautiful user interfaces. I specialize in modern JavaScript frameworks, cloud architecture, and creating seamless user experiences that drive business results.

responsibilities: Led development of microservices architecture serving 2M+ daily active users
Architected and implemented real-time collaboration features using WebSockets
Mentored team of 5 junior developers and conducted code reviews
Reduced application load time by 60% through performance optimization
Built and maintained RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express
Developed responsive web applications with React and Redux
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions and Docker
Collaborated with designers to create pixel-perfect UI implementations
Developed customer-facing features for e-commerce platform
Participated in agile development process and daily standups
Fixed bugs and implemented feature requests from user feedback
Wrote unit tests to maintain 85% code coverage

projects.name: TaskFlow Pro
projects.description: A comprehensive project management platform with real-time collaboration, Kanban boards, and AI-powered task suggestions. Built for teams of all sizes.

projects.name: EcoTracker
projects.description: Mobile-first web application for tracking personal carbon footprint with gamification elements and social sharing features.

projects.name: DevHub
projects.description: Developer community platform with code sharing, tutorials, and live coding sessions. Includes built-in code editor and syntax highlighting.
